meta.title: 3/18/2020 Update: ACCS COVID-19 Response - Albany Community Charter School

meta.name: description
meta.content: In accordance with New York State Guidelines, ACCS will remain closed through April 1. Please continue to check this site or our social media channels for updates.

article.class: post-1319 post type-post status-publish format-standard category-announcements category-1 description-off

div.p: In accordance with New York State guidance ACCS will remain closed through April 1, 2020.
Please contact your child’s homeroom teacher to receive information for expectations for classwork.
If you do not have access to the internet for I-Ready, please immediately notify your classroom teacher via class dojo, remind app, email or text.

li.a: April 16 Board of Trustee Meeting – Now Virtual
